SELECT * FROM ( SELECT event.no, event.title, event.event_date, event.type, event.holiday_yn, event.repeat_yn, event.delete_yn, event.reg_date FROM tb_event event WHERE 0=0 AND event.event_date like CONCAT('%', #{eventDate},'%') AND event.repeat_yn = 'N' AND event.type = 'S' UNION
SELECT event.no, event.title, event.event_date, event.type, event.holiday_yn, event.repeat_yn, event.delete_yn, event.reg_date FROM tb_event event WHERE 0=0 AND event.event_date like CONCAT('%-', #{month},'-%') AND event.repeat_yn = 'Y' AND event.type = 'S' UNION
SELECT event.no, event.title, lunar.lunar_date as event_date, event.type, event.holiday_yn, event.repeat_yn, event.delete_yn, event.reg_date FROM tb_event event LEFT JOIN tb_lunar lunar ON event.no = lunar.event_no WHERE 0=0 AND lunar.lunar_date like CONCAT('%', #{eventDate},'%') # AND event.repeat_yn = 'N' AND event.type = 'L' # UNION # # SELECT # event.no, # event.title, # lunar.lunar_date as event_date, # event.type, # event.holiday_yn, # event.repeat_yn, # event.delete_yn, # event.reg_date # FROM tb_event event # LEFT JOIN tb_lunar lunar # ON event.no = lunar.event_no # WHERE 0=0 # AND lunar.lunar_date like CONCAT('%', #{eventDate},'%') # AND event.repeat_yn = 'Y' # AND event.type = 'L' ) AS event_list ORDER BY DAY(event_date)
